p: In order to compare our time trend results to those produced by other organizations at the national level [ 7, 31], we fit an analogous, separate model that ignores space by dropping the three spatial terms from Eq (1). This model is effectively a national-level model for the time trend, and in what follows it is referred to as the ‘national model’. The weighted estimates are benchmarked so that at the national level they closely follow those of UN-IGME [ 32, 33], see the supporting information file S1 File.
